name: Rivium ICT & Infra
description: IT and infrastructure provision of servi
overview:
Rivium offers a wide range of services and products within the government and industry. Rivium can offer different levels of service with wide IT issues and infrastructure development projects. We can also be enabled for a specific item. We identify, advise, create, deploy, and maintain staffing.

Our organization is divided into: Rivium Business Solutions consists of four sections each with its own specialty, Integration, Business Intelligence, Market Data and Office Automation. Rivium Business Applications: the part that focuses on software development. This includes the Service Desk module with its interactive division. Rivium IT & Infrastructure: sourcing and outsourcing arm of Rivium. Managed Services is the division below. Rivium Infra focuses on providing expertise in the field of complex energy and rail infrastructure projects.
